title: Sessions Looks to Revisit Police Agreements (Audio)
itunes:title: Sessions Looks to Revisit Police Agreements (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Ames Grawert, counsel at the Brennan Center for Justice, discusses U.S. attorney general Jeff Sessions’ plans to overhaul DOJ agreements with local police forces. He speaks with Greg Stohr Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
